What are you doing, Captain?
I think it's pretty obvious. I'm stealing this jet.

translation.en: I think it's pretty obvious you're trying to.

translation.en: - You know I can track your jump. - Yeah, but you know that I know that.

translation.en: So one of us doesn't know something else, right?
translation.fr: Donc l'un de nous ne sait pas tout.

translation.en: Ma'am, he's initiated wormhole sequencing.
translation.fr: Il a lancé le séquençage des trous de ver.

translation.en: Adam, I want you to listen very carefully.
If you don't abort right now, I will shoot you out of the--
translation.fr: Cesse immédiatement ou je fais abattre t…

translation.en: I'm sorry to interrupt what I'm sure is gonna be a scary threat,

translation.en: but if I'm right, your tracking system is about to…
translation.fr: mais sauf erreur, votre système de traçage…

translation.en: - …crash. - ♪ We made it, baby ♪
- ♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪ - ♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪
- Okay, let's not die! -
Adam!
I'm gonna kill you!
Reed!
Oh no. I'm so sorry.
That's my bad. Hi.
- No. - Okay. Bye!
Reed! Get your ass back here.
- Got anything else you wanna say? - Actually, I--
translation.fr: Autre chose à dire ? En fait, je…

translation.en: - - Huh? No more jokes?
translation.fr: Fini de te foutre de moi ?

translation.en: - Oh, I'm gonna enjoy this. - Who talks like that?
translation.fr: - Ça va me plaire. - Qui parle ainsi ?

translation.en: Did you order, like, a Bully Starter Kit on Amazon or somethin'?
translation.fr: T'as acheté un kit pour petit tyran sur Amazon ?

translation.en: I mean, do you even hear yourself? Chuck, we talked about this.
translation.fr: Tu t'entends parler ? On en a parlé, Chuck.

translation.en: - I didn't say anything. - Shut up, Chuck.
There will be an assembly in the gymnasium now. Please proceed to the gymnasium.
translation.fr: Réunion au gymnase. Vous êtes priés de…

translation.en: Not a word.
See his face?
And, what, you're gonna suspend Adam? Because what?
translation.fr: Et vous allez suspendre Adam ? À quel titre ?

translation.en: You think he started a fight with that thug Ray?
translation.fr: Il aurait provoqué cette brute de Ray ?

translation.en: Was it Ray Dollarhyde again?
It's barely been a year since we lost his father.
translation.fr: On a perdu son père il y a moins d'un an.

translation.en: You could show some compassion.
It wasn't my fault.
I know you, Adam. I know that mouth of yours. I know exactly what got you punched.
translation.fr: Je connais ta grande bouche. Tu l'as bien cherché.

translation.en: He was giving me crap in front of the whole class.
translation.fr: Il s'est foutu de moi en classe. J'aurais dû me taire ?

translation.en: - I couldn't just take it. - He's twice your size.
translation.fr: Il s'est foutu de moi en classe. J'aurais dû me taire ? Il est plus grand.

translation.en: Everyone is twice my size. I've seen babies bigger than me.
translation.fr: Comme tout le monde. Même des bébés me dépassent.

translation.en: - I don't understand you. - Dad would.
translation.fr: - Je ne te comprends pas. - Papa, si.

translation.en: What's going on, honey? Can you just tell me?
translation.fr: Qu'y a-t-il, trésor ? Tu peux me le dire ?

translation.en: If I keep having to leave work in the middle of the day,
translation.fr: Si je quitte encore le bureau en journée,

translation.en: I'm gonna lose my job.
It's the third time you've been suspended for fighting.
You'd think I'd be better at it by now.
translation.fr: Et je suis toujours aussi nul.

translation.en: This goes on your permanent record. Get that? Care about your future?
translation.fr: Ce sera dans ton dossier. Tu te soucies de ton avenir ?

translation.en: Do you?
Son, you'd better start caring, because the future is coming,
translation.fr: Tu devrais t'en soucier parce que l'avenir arrive.

translation.en: sooner than you think.
Hey, Adam.
Adam, I'm headed out.
Come and have your dinner.
Where you goin'?
Oh, just out to dinner with a friend.
translation.fr: Je vais dîner avec un ami.

translation.en: Which friend?
- His name's Derek. We work together. - You're goin' on a date.
translation.fr: Derek. On travaille ensemble. C'est un rencard.

translation.en: - Not a date. I don't think it's a date. - Your dress thinks it is.
translation.fr: Mais non. Je ne crois pas. À ta robe, je dirais que si.

translation.en: Oh, it is a date. I am going on a date. Why am I going on a date?
translation.fr: À ta robe, je dirais que si. Oui. Je vais à un rencard. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Can we please stop saying date now? Thanks.
Adam, I'm sorry. We… we should have spoken about this.
translation.fr: Adam, je suis désolée. On aurait dû en parler.

translation.en: I don't know how to handle it. Let's talk about it now.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas comment m'y prendre. Parlons-en.

translation.en: - Dear God, no. - No! You can have any kind of feeling.
translation.fr: - Oh non ! - Tes sentiments sont légitimes.

translation.en: - It's normal. As long as we're a team-- -
Oh! Time to go.
He texted me?
Well, look at that.
It's a whole new world.
- But we will talk about it tonight, honey. - Mom, wait.
translation.fr: Mais on en parlera ce soir. Maman, attends.

translation.en: - What? - Turn around.
- Make good choices, okay? - Said the boy who got suspended.
translation.fr: - Sois sage. - Dit le garçon suspendu.

translation.en: I love you, honey.
I love you too, Mom. More than I know.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, plus que je ne le sais.

translation.en: Listen, while I'm out, lock up the back.
translation.fr: Pendant mon absence, ferme la porte arrière.

translation.en: No ovens, no answering the door, no video games.
translation.fr: Rien au four, n'ouvre à personne, pas de jeux vidéo.

translation.en: Hawking?
What is it? You see something?
translation.fr: C'est quoi ? Tu vois un truc ?

translation.en: - - Hawking, stop! Hawking!
- - Oh my God. You scared the crap out of me.
translation.fr: Bon sang ! Tu m'as fichu la trouille.

translation.en: - - Who's there?
I don't think we should be out here.
We're okay.
- - Hawking!
Take it easy.
- Or, you know, fall down and scream. -
translation.fr: Ou tombe et crie, comme tu veux.

translation.en: - Jeez. Who the hell are you? - Put the bat down.
Put the bat down. I'm not gonna hurt you, I promise.
translation.fr: Pose ta batte, je te veux pas de mal.

translation.en: - What are you doing in here? - Mostly bleeding.
translation.fr: Que fais-tu ici ? Je perds mon sang.

translation.en: Wait, how old are you?
- What? - How old are you?
Twelve.
Twelve…
Shit!
- How did you get in my dad's garage? - I… It was open.
translation.fr: Comment t'es entré ? - C'était ouvert. - C'est faux.

translation.en: No, it wasn't. And that is a flight suit. Are you a pilot?
translation.fr: - C'était ouvert. - C'est faux. T'en en tenue de vol. T'es pilote ?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, listen to me. Uh--
Don't-- Hey, don't call anyone. Put the phone down. I won't hurt you.
translation.fr: N'appelle personne. Pose ça. Je te ferai pas de mal.

translation.en: You said that already.
- Well, it bears-- God damn it! -
Uh, it bears repeating.
- - That's a lot of blood.
Well… well, I have so much more in my body. Where's your mother?
translation.fr: Il m'en reste plein, dans mon corps. Où est ta mère ?

translation.en: On a date.
With who?
- What? - With who? What's his name?
- I don't know. Derek? - Derek?
Derek. Derek, Derek, Derek.
That's, yes, the guy with the, um… with the mouth mullet.
translation.fr: Ah oui, celui avec le mulet de bouche.

translation.en: - The goatee? - Yeah.
So say goatee.
- Yeah, he doesn't matter. - None of them matter.
translation.fr: - Il est sans intérêt. - Comme les autres.

translation.en: Nice dog.
I'm gonna go inside the house.
I'm gonna get some stuff.
Hey, careful with that.
- Stay here. -
Come on.
Told you to stay in the garage.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit de pas bouger.

translation.en: And let some creepy dude just wander around my house alone?
translation.fr: Et laisser un type chelou se balader seul chez moi ?

translation.en: - Yeah… - I don't think so.
Yeah, believe me. I don't wanna be here any more than you want me here.
translation.fr: Tu peux me croire, je n'ai pas envie d'être ici.

translation.en: I just gotta stop bleeding long enough.
Gotta dress the wound, prevent a nasty infection,
translation.fr: Je panse la plaie, j'évite une vilaine infection

translation.en: and I will be on my merry way.
Don't touch that.
- I was just looking. - Don't touch my stuff.
- Is this a lightsaber? - No, it's not.
- Okay. - No. Enough with the bat!
- - If I wanted to hurt you, I would have.
translation.fr: J'aurais pu te taper mille fois.

translation.en: If I'm being honest with myself, you have a very punchable face.
translation.fr: Pour être honnête avec moi-même, tu as une tête à claques.

translation.en: - Oh my-- - God! That--
Gah! That bullet went straight through. Good.
- Cool. - Wait, wait, wait. Bullet? You were shot?
Yeah-- No, actually, no.
No, I was stabbed with a bullet. What do you think, you moron?
translation.fr: Non, on m'a poignardé avec une balle. À ton avis, abruti ?

translation.en: - I'm a moron? You're the one who was shot. - All right, okay, that's it.
translation.fr: - Abruti ? C'est sur toi qu'on a tiré. - Ça suffit.

translation.en: - - That… Wow… That, uh…
That's weird. It farts when I cough.
translation.fr: Bizarre. Ça pète quand je tousse.

translation.en: - Gross. - Super gross.
I'm gonna go upstairs, grab some stuff. Stay cool. You can trust me.
translation.fr: Je monte chercher des trucs. Reste cool. Fais-moi confiance.

translation.en: Easy for you to say. I'm the one who ends up in a therapist's office,
translation.fr: Facile à dire. C'est moi qui irai voir un psy pour dire où le pervers m'a touché.

translation.en: telling them about where the bad man touched me.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui irai voir un psy pour dire où le pervers m'a touché.

translation.en: Oh God! That's where you go? Immediately? You are dark, man.
translation.fr: Tu prends direct cette voie-là ? Tu es vil, petit.

translation.en: - Who even are you? - That is classified.
translation.fr: Mais tu es qui ? C'est top secret.

translation.en: Why are you here?
- Also classi… classified. - Are you in the air force?
translation.fr: - Top secret. - Tu es pilote de l'air ?

translation.en: When I say classified, what does your brain hear? Chocolate?
translation.fr: Quand je dis top secret, tu entends quoi ? Chocolat ?

translation.en: - What's with the lightsaber? - It's not a lightsaber.
translation.fr: - Et le sabre laser ? - C'en est pas un.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Adam. - I need you to play it cool. - Wait.
translation.fr: Bon sang, Adam. Sois cool, s'il te plaît.

translation.en: - I know playing it cool isn't your thing. - Wait.
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est pas ton genre…

translation.en: - It never has been-- - Wait, wait! How do you know my name?
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est pas ton genre… Attends. Tu connais mon nom ?

translation.en: You're Adam Reed. Born February 10th, 2010.
translation.fr: Tu es Adam Reed. Né le 10 février 2010.

translation.en: Your parents are Ellie and Louis Reed. Louis would've died about a year ago.
translation.fr: Tes parents, Ellie et Louis. Louis est mort il y a un an.

translation.en: You don't play any sports because of acute asthma.
translation.fr: Tu ne fais pas de sport à cause de ton asthme.

translation.en: - Plus you're freakishly small for 12. -
translation.fr: Tu es riquiqui pour ton âge.

translation.en: You go to Franklin Middle School,
where you've been suspended two, three times for fighting,
translation.fr: suspendu deux ou trois fois pour t'être battu.

translation.en: which is ironic because you can't fight to save your life.
translation.fr: C'est ironique, car tu saurais même pas frapper un punching-ball.

translation.en: Hawking! Zip it!
How do you know my dog's name?
Because I named him.
- Where are you goin'? -
- - Oh God.
All right.
Here, ready? Deep breath.
Hold it.
Three, two, one.
Everybody gets a trophy.
When I was seven,
I ran into a table on the patio.
translation.fr: j'ai percuté une table dans le patio.

translation.en: I got 12 stitches.
Right here.
You knew how to get into my dad's garage.
translation.fr: Tu savais comment ouvrir le garage.

translation.en: You knew how to close the fridge.
translation.fr: Tu savais comment fermer le frigo.

translation.en: You knew how to time my breathing.
We have the same scar.
And you're wearing my dad's watch.
translation.fr: Et tu portes la montre de mon papa.

translation.en: This watch.
This watch.
You're me.
Holy shi--
That's classified. But yes…
I once was.
I can't believe you're future me.
translation.fr: J'en reviens pas que tu sois mon futur moi.

translation.en: Okay, you came to terms with that pretty quickly. It's a little disturbing, actually.
translation.fr: Tu l'as vite accepté. C'est déconcertant, à vrai dire.

translation.en: - So why are you here? - Rescue mission.
translation.fr: - Que fais-tu là ? - Mission de sauvetage.

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to land here. I was aiming for 2018.
translation.fr: Je ne devais pas atterrir ici. Je visais 2018.

translation.en: - I need to get there as soon as possible. - Who were you trying to save in 2018?
translation.fr: - Je dois y être au plus tôt. - Tu veux sauver qui en 2018 ?

translation.en: Really?
Fine. Can you at least tell me how you got here?
translation.fr: Tu peux me dire comment tu es arrivé ici ?

translation.en: I'll show ya.
What was that?
- Crap. - What?
Uh, we're gonna switch to plan A, which is where you come in.
translation.fr: On va passer au plan A. C'est là que tu entres en jeu.

translation.en: You see, time jets, like all tech in the future, is coded to its user's DNA.
translation.fr: Les vaisseaux temporels répondent à l'ADN de leur utilisateur.

translation.en: Because I'm injured… aah, the jet won't even clear me to fly,
translation.fr: Étant blessé, il m'interdit l'accès et je ne peux pas le réparer.

translation.en: which means I can't get in there to fix her.
translation.fr: il m'interdit l'accès et je ne peux pas le réparer.

translation.en: But guess who can?
There she is.
Away we go.
Okay. Sit down.
- Oh my God. - Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sit down.
Let's see what we're dealing with here. All right, some minor shield damage.
- Coolant leaks. -
I don't know what that is, but when is a flashing red light ever good?
translation.fr: Et ça ? C'est jamais bon quand ça clignote.

translation.en: I know you wanna touch all the pretty buttons
translation.fr: Je sais que tu veux tout toucher avec tes petits doigts collants,

translation.en: with your sticky little child fingers, but the reactor has a quantum signature.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu veux tout toucher avec tes petits doigts collants, mais le réacteur a une signature quantique.

translation.en: You fire it up, they can find us.
translation.fr: Si tu l'allumes, ils nous trouvent.

translation.en: If they're here.
Who are they?
I'm glad that you didn't ask me that because they are classified.
translation.fr: Merci de ne pas avoir demandé car c'est top secret.

translation.en: - I already know you're from the future. - Believe me, I regret that.
translation.fr: - Je sais que tu viens du futur. - Et je le regrette.

translation.en: I had no intention of coming back to revisit… this.
translation.fr: Je n'avais pas l'intention de revenir pour revoir ça.

translation.en: Jesus. Okay.
Okay, I've isolated the damaged relays,
so the ship should be able to start repairing itself.
translation.fr: La navette devrait pouvoir se réparer.

translation.en: How long will that take?
Ah, it's at 50% capacity,
so hopefully less time than it takes me to heal.
translation.fr: Plus rapide que ma guérison, j'espère.

translation.en: Wait.
- Do you remember this? - Remember what?
translation.fr: - Tu te souviens de ça ? - De quoi ?

translation.en: This. Right here, right now.
You being here in 2022?
translation.fr: - De toi en 2022. - Je sais où tu veux en venir.

translation.en: - Know where you're going with this. - If this is happening to me--
translation.fr: - De toi en 2022. - Je sais où tu veux en venir. - Si je le vis… - Laisse tomber.

translation.en: - You're wasting your time. - That means it already happened to you.
translation.fr: - Si je le vis… - Laisse tomber. … tu l'as déjà vécu.

translation.en: Unless it works like a multiverse, where each ripple creates an alternate timeline--
translation.fr: Sauf si c'est un multivers avec des réalités alternatives.

translation.en: It's not a multiverse!
My God, we watched too many movies.
translation.fr: On a regardé trop de films !

translation.en: I just wanna know.
Okay.
Okay, the prevailing wisdom is that when I go back to my fixed time,
translation.fr: D'après l'opinion dominante, à mon retour dans mon temps présent,

translation.en: my memory… our memories, they reform, they reconcile.
translation.fr: mes… nos souvenirs se reforment, se réconcilient.

translation.en: - But not while I'm here. - Fixed time? What's that?
There's only one place in time where you belong on a quantum level,
translation.fr: On appartient à un seul endroit sur le plan quantique,

translation.en: where you're not screwing around with the cosmos like I am.
translation.fr: où on ne joue pas avec le cosmos comme moi.

translation.en: That is your fixed time.
translation.fr: Il s'agit de ton temps présent.

translation.en: Where you actually belong.
So by being here and telling me this,
translation.fr: En étant ici et en me disant ça,

translation.en: you may have just changed my whole future?
translation.fr: tu as peut-être changé mon avenir ?

translation.en: Honestly? Your future is pretty tragic either way.
translation.fr: De toute façon, ton avenir est funeste.

translation.en: I'm kidding! I'm kidding.
I'm not kidding.
I'm kidding. Let's go. Come on. Here we go.
So what happens now?
Nothin'. I'm just gonna lay down. Let this bullet wound heal.
Think about some key investment opportunities for your future.
translation.fr: et réfléchir à des investissements pour ton avenir.

translation.en: - Wait, like Biff from Back to the-- - Are you out of your tiny mind?
translation.fr: - Comme Biff dans Retour vers… - T'as fini, oui ?

translation.en: Get back in the house before our mother gets home, and don't make it weird.
translation.fr: Rentre avant le retour de maman et sois naturel.

translation.en: Yes?
- This is amazing. - Isn't it, though?
Mind hitting the light on your way out?
Oh, hey. I'm surprised you're still up.
Well, this night's been full of surprises, mother. That's chilling. What happened?
translation.fr: - La soirée m'a tenu éveillé. - Tu m'inquiètes. En quoi ?

translation.en: How was your not- a- date? Will you be seeing him again?
translation.fr: Comment s'est passé ton non-rencard ? Tu vas le revoir ?

translation.en: - No. I don't know. I don't think so. -
translation.fr: Non. Je ne sais pas. Je ne crois pas.

translation.en: - Hi. - Hi.
- Me again. - Yes, it is.
You left your scarf in my car.
- I did. Gosh, thanks. - Oh, hey there, kiddo.
Oh. This is my son, Adam. Adam, this is Derek.
translation.fr: C'est mon fils, Adam. Adam, c'est Derek.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Adam.
Hello. You have a wonderful mouth mullet. You must be very proud.
translation.fr: Salut. Joli mulet de bouche. Tu dois être très fier.

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Adam.
- Never heard it called that before. - Well, thanks again.
translation.fr: J'ignorais ce terme. - Merci encore. - De rien. À bientôt.

translation.en: Sure. See you soon.
translation.fr: - Merci encore. - De rien. À bientôt.

translation.en: Unlikely, but I'll put in a good word for you.
translation.fr: Peu probable mais je voterai en ta faveur.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. I'll see you at work. - Yeah. - Bye.
translation.fr: On se voit au travail. Au revoir.

translation.en: He seems nice.
What?
You can be a real jerk sometimes.
translation.fr: Tu es un vrai crétin, parfois.

translation.en: You know that?
Hey there. Good morning.
Shouldn't you be at work?
Yeah, I need to pay the insurance on the house today.
translation.fr: Je dois payer l'assurance de la maison.

translation.en: Had it in the calendar, but I can't find the statement.
translation.fr: C'est dans l'agenda. Mais je trouve pas la déclaration.

translation.en: With that filing system?
Shocking. It should all be online.
translation.fr: Ça alors ! Ça doit se trouver sur leur site.

translation.en: The minute I find myself with a few extra hours, I will set up those accounts.
translation.fr: Dès que j'aurai le temps, je créerai ces comptes.

translation.en: Until then, this is how your dad did it.
translation.fr: En attendant, je fais comme ton père.

translation.en: Hey, grab a pile.
Sorry. I gotta get to my room to think about what I've done.
translation.fr: Désolé, je dois aller réfléchir à ce que j'ai fait.

translation.en: Okay.
I gotta go.
Call me if you need me.
I won't.
Mom's gone to work.
- Dad's favorite song. - ♪ There's only one thing ♪
- ♪ Gonna set you free… ♪ - Yeah, me too.
- ♪ That's my love… ♪ - See, we agreed on something. - Maybe the only thing. - ♪ That's my love… ♪
translation.fr: On est d'accord sur une chose. Peut-être la seule.

translation.en: - ♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ - What?
- I just… You're… kinda ripped. - ♪ Let my love open the door ♪
- ♪ When everything feels… ♪ - Okay.
Do you work out?
- My genetics don't… - Ever have a thought and not let it out?
translation.fr: Ça t'arrive de pas penser tout haut ?

translation.en: Could be fun to just keep it in.
translation.fr: Essaie de garder ça pour toi.

translation.en: Maybe in the future, there's, like… like, gene therapy or nanotechnology for--
translation.fr: C'est peut-être la thérapie génique ou la nanotechnologie…

translation.en: - Don't do it. Don't… don't do it. - ♪ Let my love open the door ♪
- ♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ - So when does… all this happen.
translation.fr: Quand est-ce que tout ça arrive ?

translation.en: Does everyone skip leg day in the future?
translation.fr: On néglige ses jambes dans le futur ?

translation.en: - ♪ To your heart… ♪ - Does it happen in college?
Oh, wait. Do we get a lot of girls in college?
- I-- - Adam, time travel exists.
translation.fr: Adam ! On voyage dans le temps.

translation.en: It exists. Isn't that crazy?
Every conceptual idea you have about the universe has just been thrown out the window.
translation.fr: Toutes tes conceptions de l'univers se sont envolées.

translation.en: Yet your big question is, Do I get laid?
translation.fr: Mais toi, tu veux savoir si tu vas niquer.

translation.en: - Do I? - Jesus Christ.
- I was just wondering. - Wonder in silence.
translation.fr: - Je me demandais. - Fais-le en silence.

translation.en: - ♪ Let my love open the door ♪ - Oh my God! It's gonna happen!
- Where you goin'? - Drugstore.
I need to get this wound closed up.
translation.fr: À la pharmacie. Je dois refermer ma plaie.

translation.en: You're gonna go dressed like that?
Why don't you wear some of Dad's clothes?
How long ago was Dad's accident?
About a year and a half ago.
She still hasn't cleaned out his closet.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas vidé son armoire.

translation.en: She's not much of a housekeeper.
Hey. You have her to take care of you. She has no one. You understand?
translation.fr: Elle doit s'occuper de toi, seule.

translation.en: Do you understand?
She wakes up every morning with a broken heart and a closet full of his clothes
translation.fr: Chaque matin, le cœur brisé, elle voit cette armoire pleine

translation.en: and gets nothing from you but a fistful of crap,
translation.fr: et toi, tu lui en fais baver.

translation.en: and not even, like, ten seconds of genuine empathy.
I'm you, you know.
Tell me about it.
You know, 30 years, you still get sick to your stomach
translation.fr: Après 30 ans, ça te rend malade de penser à ce que tu lui as fait subir.

translation.en: every time you remember how you treated her now.
translation.fr: ça te rend malade de penser à ce que tu lui as fait subir.

translation.en: I used to love this jacket.
Dad did too.
I keep waiting to wake up and miss him less,
translation.fr: J'attends le jour où il me manquera moins,

translation.en: but that hasn't happened yet.
Do you still miss him?
Missed him while he was here.
- It's not gonna fit you. - Sure it will.
- - How's the jet?
It's gettin' there.
So the person you came to save is in 2018.
translation.fr: La personne que tu es venu sauver est en 2018

translation.en: And somehow, you ended up in 2022. How does that work? You just missed?
translation.fr: et tu as atterri en 2022. Comment ça marche ? Tu t'es loupé ?

translation.en: Well, I got shot when I was stealing the plane.
translation.fr: On m'a tiré dessus quand j'ai volé la navette.

translation.en: So, uh… I was losin' blood. Ship was comin' apart.
translation.fr: Je perdais du sang. Le vaisseau tombait en morceaux.

translation.en: I jammed the coordinates. I didn't have time to double- check 'em.
translation.fr: J'ai brouillé les coordonnées sans vérifier.

translation.en: - Wait, you stole the jet? - It's encoded to me.
translation.fr: - Tu l'as volé ? - Il m'est encodé.

translation.en: So I didn't exactly steal it. I borrowed the shit out of it.
translation.fr: Je ne l'ai pas vraiment volé. Plutôt emprunté.

translation.en: - There's a difference. Give me some cash. - You don't have money?
translation.fr: C'est pas pareil. Du fric. - T'en as pas ? - On n'en utilise plus.

translation.en: - We don't use money in the future. - Really?
translation.fr: - T'en as pas ? - On n'en utilise plus. Vraiment ?

translation.en: Of course we use money in the future. Stay here.
translation.fr: Je te fais marcher. Reste ici.

translation.en: What's up, Reed?
Crap.
Well, look who we have here.
Ray, can we just take a break from the ass kicking today?
translation.fr: Ray, on peut faire une pause aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: I have a lot going on.
translation.fr: J'ai un tas de trucs à gérer.

translation.en: Hey, guys. Enjoying our suspension?
translation.fr: Ça va ? Vous passez une bonne suspension ?

translation.en: I am now.
That's my spleen.
I remember these little turd- burpers.
translation.fr: Je me souviens de ces morveux.

translation.en: - Hey, man, we're, uh… just playin' around. - Quiet, Ray. This isn't about you.
translation.fr: On s'amuse, c'est tout. Boucle-la, Ray. Ça ne te concerne pas.

translation.en: Hey, what's goin' on? Huh?
Get it together. Ray's ready. You're embarrassing yourself.
translation.fr: Reprends-toi. Ray est prêt. Tu te ridiculises.

translation.en: So you're not gonna break this up?
God, no. That'd be irresponsible of me.
translation.fr: Ça va pas ? Ce serait irresponsable.

translation.en: You'll just figure out some other way to pound the crap out of him.
translation.fr: Et puis, tu trouveras un autre moyen de le défoncer.

translation.en: You always do.
He's got a big mouth. I get it.
translation.fr: Il a une grande gueule. Je sais.

translation.en: Point is, this fight needs to happen right now.
translation.fr: Ce combat doit avoir lieu maintenant.

translation.en: So just give us a second, okay, Ray?
Stretch out. You don't wanna pull a hammy.
translation.fr: Étire-toi ou tu vas te claquer.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Hey, Ray Dollarhyde has been bullying you for years
translation.fr: Ray te harcèle depuis des années

translation.en: because you're small, and fragile, and you have a big mouth.
translation.fr: car tu es petit, fragile et tu as une grande gueule.

translation.en: But here's the thing. He doesn't wanna fight.
translation.fr: Mais il ne veut pas se battre.

translation.en: - I don't wanna fight either. - He doesn't know that, does he?
translation.fr: Moi non plus. Il ne le sait pas !

translation.en: So you're gonna walk over there, and you're gonna raise your hands,
translation.fr: Tu vas aller là-bas et tu vas lever les mains.

translation.en: and then you're gonna look Ray right in the eye.
translation.fr: Et tu vas regarder Ray droit dans les yeux.

translation.en: You're gonna smile in a way that says,
I've waited my entire life for this moment.
translation.fr: J'ai attendu ça toute ma vie.

translation.en: Like you can't wait to watch his soul exit his body.
translation.fr: Comme si tu avais hâte de voir son âme quitter son corps.

translation.en: Then you're gonna drop to your knees and punch him hard in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.fr: Puis tu vas t'agenouiller et éclater ses roubignoles.

translation.en: - I'm sorry, the what now? - Ah! Are we gonna smoke this banana?
translation.fr: Ses quoi ? On lui met la misère ou on papote ?

translation.en: Or are we gonna talk about it all day? Let's go, go, go, go, go.
translation.fr: On lui met la misère ou on papote ?  Allez !

translation.en: I'm gonna smoke your banana, motherf--
translation.fr: Je vais te mettre la misère, fils de…

translation.en: No, no, no, no! No. That… that's not what we talked about.
- Nice, man. - You crying, Reed?
Oh no, Chuck. Look, we made him cry.
translation.fr: Oh non, Chuck. On l'a fait pleurer.

translation.en: It's like he was trying to lose.
Run away, Reed!
- What the hell? - I'm not supposed to do this.
Ever hear the expression, Every bully has a bully?
translation.fr: Tu vois le dicton Tout tyran a un tyran ?

translation.en: Yours isn't holding up his end of the bargain, so I'm gonna take over.
translation.fr: Le tien fait pas son taf, je prends le relais.

translation.en: - What are you talking about? -
You're a good fighter. You like to kick ass. You're a big kid.
translation.fr: Tu te bats bien. Tu aimes tabasser. Tu es grand.

translation.en: But if you go near Adam again, I'll know, and I will find you, Ray.
translation.fr: Mais si tu t'approches d'Adam, je le saurai et je te retrouverai.

translation.en: And it won't be like a couple of kids in a playground scrap.
translation.fr: Et ce ne sera pas une petite bagarre entre deux gosses.

translation.en: I will pull bones out of your body.
I will sharpen them.
- I will use them to stab little Chuckie. - What did I do?
translation.fr: - Je poignarderai Chuckie avec. - J'ai rien fait !

translation.en: Shut your mouth, or I'll fill it with Ray's feet.
translation.fr: Ferme ta bouche ou j'enfonce ses pieds dedans.

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying? Got all of it? The bones?
translation.fr: Tu as compris, Ray ? Tout ? Les os ? Tes pieds dans la bouche de Chuck ? Bien.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Your feet in Chuckie's mouth?
translation.fr: Tout ? Les os ? Tes pieds dans la bouche de Chuck ? Bien.

translation.en: - - Good. Are you peeing right now?
translation.fr: Tout ? Les os ? Tes pieds dans la bouche de Chuck ? Bien. Tu te pisses dessus ? C'est un torrent.

translation.en: - Yeah. - You're a real streamer.
translation.fr: Tu te pisses dessus ? C'est un torrent.

translation.en: Get yourself home and clean yourself up.
Be the change you wanna see, okay?
translation.fr: Sois le changement que tu veux voir.

translation.en: God, I hated those assholes.
Oh, come on.
Hey, Adam.
Get out of my stuff and open the door.
Put the drone down. It will kill us both.
translation.fr: Pose ce drone ou tu vas nous tuer.

translation.en: Hey, look, you lost one fight. I figured you'd be used to that by now.
translation.fr: Tu as perdu un combat. Je te croyais habitué.

translation.en: You coulda helped. You just stood there.
Christ. You're so sensitive.
Hey, you had to lose that fight.
You had to. Trust me.
You don't go from bein' you to bein' me without gettin' your ass kicked,
translation.fr: Tu ne passes pas de toi à moi sans te faire botter le cul,

translation.en: a lot, all the time.
I'm sorry if I went too far today.
translation.fr: Désolé si je suis allé trop loin.

translation.en: Shouldn't have done that.
- Who's this? - Who's who?
Put that back.
You put that back.
As soon as you tell me who she is.
translation.fr: Quand tu m'auras dit qui c'est.

translation.en: That's my wife, Laura.
We have a wife?
No, we do not have a wife anymore.
translation.fr: Non, on n'a plus de femme.

translation.en: - Hey. - Hi.
- Aah. Hi, there. How are you? - Hey, Paul.
Been a while.
Yep, how you doin'? That baby sleeping yet?
translation.fr: Comment vas-tu ? Ton bébé fait ses nuits ?

translation.en: Uh, not really. No.
No. Well, you'll miss those days when they're gone.
Ah, I find that hard to believe.
translation.fr: J'ai du mal à y croire.

translation.en: Believe it. Babies are pure love.
translation.fr: Crois-moi. Les bébés, c'est de l'amour pur.

translation.en: They grow into teenagers, who grow into be assassins of happiness.
translation.fr: Puis ils deviennent des ados, des assassins du bonheur.

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
Mm, well, somethin' to look forward to.
Sorry. It's been a rough day.
Year. Couple of years.
Hmm. Your boy still havin' a hard time?
He hates me.
It's not his fault. He's… he's just dealing.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas de sa faute. Il gère à sa manière.

translation.en: It's fine. We'll be fine. It's good. Good, good, good.
translation.fr: Ce n'est rien, ça va aller. Tout va bien.

translation.en: I wish I knew what I was doin' wrong. You're not doin' anything wrong.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que je fais de travers ? - Rien du tout.

translation.en: Sorry.
- I'm sorry. - Sorry, you scared me. - I was eavesdropping. I'm sorry. - Yeah.
translation.fr: - Vous m'avez fait peur. - J'écoutais, désolé.

translation.en: You're right, though. Teenage boys are horrible.
It's like living with a urinal cake that yells at you.
translation.fr: C'est comme un putois qui vous crie dessus.

translation.en: Mothers are usually the ones who take the hit.
translation.fr: Ce sont les mères qui prennent tout.

translation.en: Yeah.
- But I'll tell you somethin'. - Mmm?
Boys always come back for their mamas.
translation.fr: Ils reviennent toujours vers leur maman.

translation.en: That's nice.
It sounds like you're speaking from experience.
translation.fr: Vous savez de quoi vous parlez.

translation.en: I am.
You have a good mom? - I do. - Oh.
translation.fr: - Vous avez une bonne maman ? - Oui.

translation.en: I have the best mom.
Good.
I hope you're right.
I'm still researching boarding schools in Fallujah, so…
translation.fr: Je me renseigne sur les pensionnats à Falloujah, alors…

translation.en: - Good. -
No, I don't mean that. He's such a sweet kid.
translation.fr: Non, je plaisante. C'est un gamin adorable.

translation.en: I'm crazy about him.
We lost his dad in a car accident year before last.
translation.fr: On a perdu son père dans un accident de voiture.

translation.en: Yeah. That's tough.
Yeah. You have no idea.
Well, I have some idea.
- Oh, sorry. - Sorry.
Jinx.
- Thank you. - Thank you.
Aren't you grieving too?
- Yeah. - Yeah.
I am. Of course I am.
So tell him.
You should tell him.
I don't think he needs it.
You think you're being strong for him,
and the problem with acting like you have it all together is…
translation.fr: Mais quand vous faites semblant d'aller bien,

translation.en: he believes it.
Maybe he needs to know that you don't.
translation.fr: Il doit savoir que vous souffrez.

translation.en: It's okay if you don't.
My husband had a jacket just like that.
translation.fr: Mon mari avait la même veste que la vôtre.

translation.en: Oh, this is a classic.
Yeah.
It was really nice chatting with you. I'll see you later.
translation.fr: Merci pour la discussion. À une autre fois.

translation.en: Oh, hey, um…
he doesn't hate you.
He loves you.
More than he knows.
Locked and docked.
Start the area scans for his jet.
translation.fr: Scanne la zone pour le localiser.

translation.en: Let's find him and get the hell outta here.
translation.fr: On le trouve et on dégage.

translation.en: Find him.
- So you came back for your wife, Laura? - We're not getting into that.
translation.fr: - Tu es revenu pour ta femme, Laura ? - Commence pas.

translation.en: Hey, she's my wife too.
- You know what? We should get into that. - Thank you.
Met in the academy.
She was 20 minutes late to the wrong classroom
translation.fr: Elle avait 20 minutes de retard dans la mauvaise salle

translation.en: in the wrong building.
I offered to walk her to the right one, and…
man, I was all in before we even made it outside.
translation.fr: Une minute après, j'étais déjà fou d'elle.

translation.en: A couple of years ago, she didn't come back from a jump.
translation.fr: Il y a deux ans, elle n'est pas revenue d'un saut.

translation.en: They told me her jet broke up on reentry, but she was the best pilot in the program.
translation.fr: Soi-disant sa navette a lâché au retour mais c'était la meilleure pilote.

translation.en: She wrote the book on reentry. Didn't make sense.
translation.fr: Elle a même écrit le manuel. Ça n'a aucun sens.

translation.en: And you were trying to get to 2018 'cause that's where she went before?
translation.fr: Et tu essayais d'aller en 2018 car c'est là qu'elle est allée.

translation.en: Yeah.
- What was she doing there? - I don't know.
translation.fr: - Elle y faisait quoi ? - Je sais pas.

translation.en: They changed the jump logs.
Somebody was hidin' somethin'.
Maybe she saw something Sorian didn't want her to see.
translation.fr: Elle a pu voir un truc que Sorian veut taire.

translation.en: Wait, Sorian? Maya Sorian, Dad's partner?
translation.fr: Maya Sorian, la partenaire de papa ?

translation.en: - She was always so nice to me. - Hmm.
Yeah, trust me. She's no friend.
translation.fr: Oui, mais crois-moi, ce n'est pas une amie.

translation.en: Nope.
After Dad died, she got rich off of his tech.
translation.fr: Elle a tiré profit de la technologie de papa,

translation.en: Bought all the right people.
Next thing you know, she has exclusive control over the most valuable resource on Earth,
translation.fr: Maintenant, elle a le contrôle exclusif de la ressource la plus précieuse :

translation.en: time.
Wait a minute. You're saying Dad invented time travel?
translation.fr: Attends. Papa a inventé le voyage dans le temps ?

translation.en: Yeah.
Not on purpose.
The magnetic particle accelerator. Remember that?
He called it The Adam Project.
Yeah, or as I like to call it, his favorite child.
translation.fr: Moi je l'appelle son enfant préféré.

translation.en: So what happened to Laura?
Mmm. Well, I think your nice friend Maya had her killed.
translation.fr: - Je crois que ta pote Maya l'a fait tuer. - Hein ?

translation.en: - What? - Yeah.
translation.fr: - Je crois que ta pote Maya l'a fait tuer. - Hein ? Oui.

translation.en: That's why I gotta get back to 2018 as soon as possible.
translation.fr: Je dois vite retourner en 2018. La navette va être prête.

translation.en: The jet's almost ready. I'll lay low in the shed.
translation.fr: Je dois vite retourner en 2018. La navette va être prête. Je reste planqué le temps de guérir.

translation.en: I'll heal for a few more days until I can get a clean read
translation.fr: Je reste planqué le temps de guérir. Une fois habilité à voler, je partirai.

translation.en: and then fly out of your life.
translation.fr: Une fois habilité à voler, je partirai.

translation.en: But going back to save her. - Talking to me. -
translation.fr: Mais tu reviens la sauver, tu me parles.

translation.en: Everything you're doing right now just to rescue one person.
translation.fr: Tout ce que tu fais en ce moment pour sauver une personne.

translation.en: You're changing the future. That's gotta be against the rules.
translation.fr: Tu changes le futur. C'est sûrement interdit.

translation.en: You'll feel differently when you meet her.
translation.fr: Tu verras quand tu la rencontreras.

translation.en: - And when you lose her. - What?
Grab that bag. Get ready to run.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Prends ce sac. Prépare-toi à courir.

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
We're going that way. Be ready.
translation.fr: On va par là. Tiens-toi prêt.

translation.en: - Move! -
Stay behind me.
Don't you do it! Don't you do it, Reed!
translation.fr: Ne fais pas ça ! Non, Reed !

translation.en: Wanna see something cool?
- That's a lightsaber, dude. - Quiet now.
Time to go. Let's go.
Hello, Adam.
Reed, don't move!
Christos. They'll let anyone into this time stream.
translation.fr: Christos ? Ils laissent entrer n'importe qui.

translation.en: Who's that?
That's Christos. We were in the academy together.
translation.fr: Christos. On était à l'académie ensemble.

translation.en: He's a decent pilot but a terrible person.
He runs security for Sorian.
Ouchie, with the face. Did I do that?
God, I hope the boss lets me kill you.
translation.fr: Pitié, qu'elle me laisse te tuer.

translation.en: In fairness, though, you did shoot me first.
translation.fr: À ma décharge, tu as tiré le premier.

translation.en: On the bright side, your… your face now matches your soul.
translation.fr: Au moins, maintenant, ton visage reflète ton âme.

translation.en: - Anyone say you talk too much? - All the time.
translation.fr: - Tu parles trop, tu sais ? - Oui.

translation.en: - It's come up. - That's enough.
translation.fr: - On me l'a déjà dit. - Assez !

translation.en: Adam, before this goes any further, let's just go home, please.
translation.fr: Adam, avant que ça n'aille trop loin, rentre à la maison, s'il te plaît.

translation.en: Uh, no! Just… just no.
So you're risking your own young life
over some paranoid delusion that I somehow killed Laura.
translation.fr: à cause d'un délire paranoïaque comme quoi j'aurais tué Laura ?

translation.en: I loved Laura. You were both like family to me.
translation.fr: J'adorais Laura. Vous étiez comme ma famille.

translation.en: I would never have hurt her. I hate that it's come to this.
translation.fr: Je ne lui aurais jamais fait de mal. Je déteste en arriver là.

translation.en: Guns.
Christos, please escort Adam back to 2050.
- You're up. - Yeah. All right, drop the Mag- Cyl.
translation.fr: - À toi de jouer. - Oui. Lâche le Mag-Cyl.

translation.en: - This? - Yeah.
- Yeah. Okay. - All right.
Wanna start low or go high?
- Stop! Get off him! -
- Move! - ♪ I was told what it means ♪
- What is happening? - Dying outside your fixed time is messy.
translation.fr: Il se passe quoi ? Mourir hors de son temps présent, c'est moche.

translation.en: - What are you doing here? - Saving your ass, honey. Behind you!
translation.fr: Que fais-tu ici ? Je te sauve, chéri. Derrière toi !

translation.en: I can't believe…
- I can't believe you're here. - ♪ Good times, bad times ♪
translation.fr: à croire que tu sois là.

translation.en: - Hey. - Hi.
That was awesome.
- We should go. - Yep. Let's go. Come on, come on, come on!
Go. Go!
I knew you'd come someday. I just didn't know when.
translation.fr: Je savais que tu viendrais, mais pas quand.

translation.en: Of course I came.
Eyes on the road, please.
They said you lit up on reentry. That's crap. I have the top reentry stats in the program.
translation.fr: - Ils m'ont dit que tu avais explosé. - J'ai les meilleures stat'.

translation.en: - Oh yeah. -
Laura, this is… me.
- Hi. - Parallel contact, babe?
Well, you've always said that you wished you'd met me earlier.
translation.fr: Tu disais que tu aurais aimé me rencontrer plus tôt.

translation.en: - Here I am. - Yeah.
All right, can we maybe slow down a bit now? There's no one even following us.
translation.fr: On peut ralentir ? Personne ne nous suit.

translation.en: Don't look back. Look up.
translation.fr: Ne regarde pas derrière. En haut.

translation.en: Gotta get off this road. We're too exposed.
translation.fr: Quittons la route. On est à découvert.

translation.en: Okay, baby, it's about to get busier.
Go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
Stop the car.
- What? - What?
- Stop! -
Okay, back, back. Go, go, go! Reverse!
Go, go, go, go!
They're leaving.
They're not leaving. They're regrouping.
- We have to get off this road fast. - What road?
translation.fr: - Il faut quitter cette route. - Quelle route ?

translation.en: I… I don't understand. How did you find us?
You don't think I'd be watching your back, even in the past?
translation.fr: Je veille toujours sur toi, même dans le passé.

translation.en: Why did you make the jump back in the first place?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu es retournée dans le passé ?

translation.en: I was analyzing data when I found something strange in the jump logs.
translation.fr: En analysant les registres, j'ai repéré une anomalie.

translation.en: A time jet returning from 2018.
How's that strange?
Because no one ever flew to 2018.
I don't get it. How did it come back if it never left?
translation.fr: Il est revenu mais n'est jamais parti ?

translation.en: Unless someone went back and altered the time stream,
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un a altéré la ligne temporelle,

translation.en: so the future the jet had left from had already been changed.
translation.fr: le futur d'où vient la navette avait déjà été modifié.

translation.en: God, it's like I traded my brains for those muscles.
translation.fr: J'ai échangé mon cerveau contre ces muscles ?

translation.en: It's a shit deal.
- Cute kid. - Precious, isn't he?
Don't you just wanna hold him underwater till the bubbles stop?
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas envie de lui tenir la tête sous l'eau ?

translation.en: - - Oh, I freakin' hate myself.
How did this happen?
That jet that went back? It was Sorian's.
translation.fr: La navette dans le passé, c'était Sorian.

translation.en: She went back to November 2018 for a reason.
translation.fr: Elle est revenue en novembre 2018 pour une raison.

translation.en: What happened in November 2018?
I'll tell ya.
This happened.
Your father's magnetic particle accelerator,
The Adam Project, had just gone online.
translation.fr: le Projet Adam, a été mis en ligne.

translation.en: That was the first step toward practical time travel.
translation.fr: Le premier pas vers le voyage temporel.

translation.en: Sorian must've come back to 2018
and given her younger self some kind of future intel.
translation.fr: pour se donner à elle-même des infos du futur.

translation.en: What for?
My guess is enough future stock tips to amass her fortune
translation.fr: À mon avis, des conseils boursiers pour faire fortune

translation.en: and get rid of whatever political obstacles were keeping her from gaining control of the time program.
translation.fr: et éliminer tout obstacle pour s'accaparer le programme temporel.

translation.en: She already had that.
But did she?
No.
No, she didn't.
So this world, our world,
translation.fr: Donc ce monde, notre monde, tout a déjà été changé par Sorian.

translation.en: everything has already been changed by Sorian.
translation.fr: notre monde, tout a déjà été changé par Sorian.

translation.en: And your fixed time, 2050, is it bad there?
translation.fr: Et dans ton temps présent, en 2050, ça va mal ?

translation.en: - We've seen Terminator, right? - Obviously.
translation.fr: - On a vu Terminator, non ? - Oui.

translation.en: That's 2050 on a good day.
Sorian must've spotted me and planted an altitude bomb on my jet.
translation.fr: Sorian a dû me repérer et poser une bombe d'altitude sur moi.

translation.en: Here, eat something.
- I managed to eject, but it didn't matter. -
translation.fr: J'ai réussi à m'éjecter, mais à quoi bon ?

translation.en: Without my jet, I was a permanent castaway.
translation.fr: Sans ma navette, impossible de repartir.

translation.en: So I had to follow protocol, you know, live out my life here,
translation.fr: J'ai dû suivre le protocole : vivre ma vie ici, éviter tout contact, minimiser mon empreinte

translation.en: avoid contact, minimize my footprint,
translation.fr: vivre ma vie ici, éviter tout contact, minimiser mon empreinte

translation.en: and hope you were crazy enough to come look for me.
translation.fr: et espérer que tu viennes me chercher.

translation.en: Alone. All this time.
Four years.
That's the job, right?
- Yeah, but, baby-- - It's…
It's fine. I got used to being alone.
translation.fr: Ça va, je me suis habituée à être seule.

translation.en: Not anymore.
I found you.
- - I found you.
You found me.
- I'll take my eyes and ears for a walk. - Bye now.
translation.fr: - Je vais aller voir ailleurs. - Ciao.

translation.en: You kids have fun.
- What's wrong? - I got shot.
- You got shot? - By a gun, yeah.
- Reed? - Yeah?
- Suck it up. - Yes, ma'am.
- You know what you have to do. - Nooooo.
translation.fr: - Tu sais ce que tu as à faire. - Non.

translation.en: No, I came back for you.
I know.
But we can't have a life here. Not like this.
translation.fr: Mais on ne peut pas vivre ici. Pas comme ça.

translation.en: Now you have to go back to 2018, and you have to put things right.
translation.fr: Maintenant, tu dois retourner en 2018 pour tout arranger.

translation.en: - You have to put an end to all this. - What do you mean put an end to it?
translation.fr: Il faut mettre fin à tout ça. C'est-à-dire ?

translation.en: I mean, stop time travel
translation.fr: C'est-à-dire empêcher l'invention du voyage temporel et sauver l'avenir.

translation.en: from ever being invented and save the future.
translation.fr: empêcher l'invention du voyage temporel et sauver l'avenir.

translation.en: Fine, come with me, and we'll--
Your jet is meshed for your DNA. It won't fly with anyone else.
translation.fr: Ta navette est conçue pour ton ADN, sans passager.

translation.en: - You're smart. You can figure it out. - Adam!
We meet in the program. We meet there. Do you understand that? We can't…
translation.fr: On s'est rencontrés à l'académie. Tu comprends ? Si on…

translation.en: If I go back and stop time travel,
translation.fr: Si je détruis le voyage temporel, et c'est pas gagné

translation.en: and that's an extremely big if with Sorian on my ass,
translation.fr: Si je détruis le voyage temporel, et c'est pas gagné avec Sorian qui me colle au train,

translation.en: we never meet.
We never happen.
We never happen, Laura.
We did happen.
Every moment we ever had will always have happened.
translation.fr: Tous les moments qu'on a vécus existeront toujours.

translation.en: Even if we correct the time stream,
translation.fr: Même si on corrige la ligne temporelle,

translation.en: somewhere in us will be the echo of this one.
translation.fr: cette vie-là résonnera quelque part au fond de nous.

translation.en: And we will find each other.
I really believe that.
What if we don't? What if… what if you're wrong? And you're probably wrong.
translation.fr: Et si tu te trompes ? Et tu te trompes sûrement.

translation.en: When am I ever wrong?
I can't do this again, okay?
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas revivre ça.

translation.en: I can't do this again, please. I can't afford to lose you. Don't do this.
translation.fr: J'y arriverai pas. Je ne peux pas te perdre. Ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: What is that?
They found us.
Damn it!
There's a dirt road around the bend.
translation.fr: Il y a un petit chemin. Je vous ferai gagner du temps.

translation.en: - I'll buy you time to get to your jet. - No, no, no. Hey. I'm not leaving.
translation.fr: Il y a un petit chemin. Je vous ferai gagner du temps. Non. Je ne pars pas.

translation.en: - You have to. - What are you talking about?
translation.fr: Non. Je ne pars pas. - Il le faut. - Ils vont te tuer.

translation.en: - Those guys'll kill you. - No! I've had years--
translation.fr: - Il le faut. - Ils vont te tuer. J'ai des années de préparation. Ils ne me verront pas venir.

translation.en: I've had years to rig my defenses. They'll never see me coming.
translation.fr: J'ai des années de préparation. Ils ne me verront pas venir.

translation.en: - If they catch you, it's over. - That's the only reason--
Adam! Stop it! Please.
I know you came for me.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu es venu pour moi.

translation.en: Now you have to leave for me, please.
translation.fr: Maintenant, tu dois partir pour moi.

translation.en: Please.
We can fix this.
Hey, I love you.
That's why I know you're gonna find me again.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que tu me retrouveras.

translation.en: Go.
Go!
God damn it!
Come on.
Come on.
Jet's not reading me because of my vitals. I'll need your DNA to start her up.
translation.fr: La navette ne me répond toujours pas. J'ai besoin de ton ADN.

translation.en: When we get to altitude, the bio stop will come down, and then I can take over.
translation.fr: En altitude, fini le biostop, je prendrai le relais.

translation.en: We have to move fast, or they'll be on us before we can jump to 2018.
translation.fr: Il faut agir vite ou ils nous rattraperont.

translation.en: - Wait. What? I'm not coming with you. - Yes, you are. Let's go. We need to go.
translation.fr: Je viens pas avec toi. Oh que si. Allez, vite.

translation.en: Christos!
- - It's good to see you, buddy.
Laura, is that you?
You're not still mad at me for blowing up your jet, are you?
translation.fr: Tu m'en veux d'avoir fait exploser ta navette ?

translation.en: If I'm being honest, yeah, I'm still kinda pissed.
translation.fr: Pour être honnête, j'ai pas bien digéré.

translation.en: Will you stop and listen to me?
This is my fixed time. You already had my childhood.
translation.fr: C'est mon temps présent. Tu as déjà été enfant.

translation.en: You had adventures, you flew planes,
and I'm still the nerd with an inhaler who gets his ass kicked.
translation.fr: Moi je suis le petit geek qui se fait botter le cul.

translation.en: I want the rest of it. - Want the rest? - Yeah.
translation.fr: - Je veux vivre le reste. - Vraiment ?

translation.en: Here's the rest of it. Dad's death screws you up more than you ever realize.
translation.fr: Voilà le reste. La mort de papa te fout en l'air.

translation.en: You get depressed. You get angry.
You wander around school without making a social dent.
translation.fr: Au lycée, tu restes seul dans ton coin.

translation.en: College is a high point, until after a year, you lose your scholarship
translation.fr: À la fac, tu vas bien, jusqu'à ce que tu perdes ta bourse

translation.en: for something that is so unbelievably stupid
translation.fr: jusqu'à ce que tu perdes ta bourse pour un truc tellement débile que je n'en parlerai pas.

translation.en: I cannot even say it out loud right now.
translation.fr: pour un truc tellement débile que je n'en parlerai pas.

translation.en: You end up in the air force. Turns out you could really fly.
translation.fr: Tu finis dans l'armée de l'air. Tu es bon pilote.

translation.en: And then along comes time travel, and the whole world starts to fall apart
translation.fr: Puis vient le voyage dans le temps et le monde s'effondre

translation.en: until the only woman you have…
the only woman you ever loved gets taken away.
translation.fr: la seule femme que tu aies jamais aimée.

translation.en: Do you understand me?
Till you lose…
She… she just gets taken away.
- There's gotta be more than that. - There is, kid.
translation.fr: Tu me dis pas tout. Il y a plus, oui.

translation.en: And thanks to Sorian, none of it's good.
We can fix it.
- By destroying time travel? - That's right.
translation.fr: - En empêchant le voyage temporel ? - Oui.

translation.en: How are we gonna do that? What's your plan?
I'm not gonna explain my plan to a nerd with an inhaler--
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas expliquer mon plan à un petit geek…

translation.en: - You don't have a plan. - Because I do not have a plan. - Exactly. - That is correct.
translation.fr: - Tu n'as pas de plan. - C'est exact.

translation.en: But I know somebody who might.
Dad.
Dad.
You're gonna find Dad.
Nope.
We're gonna find Dad.
So are you in or are you--
Tell your husband to get his bitch ass out here.
translation.fr: Dis à ton mari de ramener son cul ici.

translation.en: He's busy right now,
but I'll tell him you stopped by.
translation.fr: Je lui dirai que tu es passé.

translation.en: Hello, Laura.
You should have stayed dead the first time.
translation.fr: Tu aurais mieux fait de rester morte.

translation.en: Now, where is your husband?
Here we go. All right, give me your hand.
- - Like that, yep.
Nice, healthy DNA right there.
translation.fr: Un joli ADN en bonne santé.

translation.en: Okay, we'll park it down there,
grab on to that railing,
hold on for dear life, and try not to pass out from the G's, okay?
translation.fr: s'accrocher à la vie et résister aux champs G.

translation.en: What's a… Jesus!
- What's happening? - That.
What are you doing?
Gotcha!
Hang on.
I told you to hang on.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit de tenir bon.

translation.en: Don't give me that stink eye.
Where you going?
Shit!
Okay, hold tight. I've always wanted to try this.
translation.fr: Tiens bon, j'ai toujours voulu essayer.

translation.en: Did you just turn the plane off?
Yes, I did.  Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,
Where the hell are they?
- They gotta be here somewhere. - Adam, check your ion readings.
translation.fr: Forcément pas loin. Adam, vérifie tes relevés.

translation.en: The reactor's damaged.
You have one jump left.
translation.fr: Il te reste un seul saut.

translation.en: If you don't come back now, you never will.
translation.fr: C'est ta seule chance de revenir un jour.

translation.en: What do you say, kid? Your call.
We don't pull this off, we're not gettin' back, either one of us.
translation.fr: En cas d'échec, on sera tous les deux bloqués.

translation.en: - Punch that shit. - Oh yeah!
Gotcha.
- ♪ Well, my temperature's rising… ♪ - Come on!
- ♪ Crazy people knockin'… ♪ - Adam! I got this.
Come on, Reed. Come on.
- Adam! - I got it!
Come on!
- Let's not… -
Die!
It's not meant to be easy.
Listen, guys, instead of moaning about it,
translation.fr: Écoutez, au lieu de vous plaindre,

translation.en: give yourself permission to be inadequate, and then get to work.
translation.fr: acceptez votre incompétence et mettez-vous au travail.

translation.en: You can't be good at something unless you're willing to be… - …at it first. -
translation.fr: On ne peut pas être bon avant d'accepter d'être une m…

translation.en: - Professor Reed. - Sophie.
It'll take two semesters just to begin solving that.
translation.fr: Ça nous prendrait l'année pour résoudre ça.

translation.en: Oh, good God, at least that.
Even then, we'll fail the class, because this is bonkers.
translation.fr: Et on devra redoubler car c'est du délire.

translation.en: Sophie, you can do this.
Listen, guys, that is the beauty of physics.
translation.fr: C'est ça, la beauté de la physique.

translation.en: That is the beauty of life…
translation.fr: C'est ça, la beauté de la vie.

translation.en: It's really him.
- Yep. - If you think you've got…
He's so…
Yeah.
Alive. Come here for a second. Hey.
- Let me do the talking in there. - We have to tell him what happens.
translation.fr: Laisse-moi lui parler. Si on le prévient, il mourra pas.

translation.en: - He doesn't have to die. - We say nothing, okay?
translation.fr: Si on le prévient, il mourra pas. On ne lui dit pas.

translation.en: Only what he needs to know. Everything else…
we can't.
I wanna hear you say it, I won't tell him. Say it.
translation.fr: Dis-le : Je ne lui dirai pas.

translation.en: - Say it. - I won't tell him.
translation.fr: - Dis-le. - Je ne lui dirai pas.

translation.en: Physics is a slog. It's a slog.
translation.fr: C'est un travail de longue haleine.

translation.en: We are meant to work on problems that our children will solve.
translation.fr: On travaille sur des problèmes que nos enfants résoudront.

translation.en: You might find the odd solution here or there.
I just got your shirt, by the way. It's very clever.
translation.fr: Je viens de comprendre ton pull. Très malin.

translation.en: But you will die before your life's work is done.
translation.fr: Mais vous mourrez avant d'avoir achevé le travail.

translation.en: Your cold, lifeless husk will be moldering in the ground
translation.fr: Votre cadavre froid se putréfiera sous terre,

translation.en: while generations that come after you
will be finishing the work that you started.
translation.fr: finiront ce que vous avez commencé.

translation.en: To quote the Romans,
Enjoy yourselves. It's later than you think.
translation.fr: Amusez-vous. Il est plus tard que vous le croyez.

translation.en: - I am s… I'm sorry? - Guy Lombardo. That was… Yeah.
translation.fr: Je vous demande pardon ? Guy Lombardo.

translation.en: The quote, um… It's later than you think. It's not the Romans.
translation.fr: Cette citation ne vient pas des Romains,

translation.en: It's a singer. Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians.
translation.fr: mais d'un chanteur, Guy Lombardo et Royal Canadians.

translation.en: It was Guy Lombardo,
and it was from his 1949 classic, Enjoy Yourself.
translation.fr: et son tube de 1949, Enjoy Yourself.

translation.en: But long before that,
it was the Romans who etched it on their sundials.
translation.fr: les Romains la gravaient sur leurs cadrans solaires.

translation.en: So, uh… so we're both right.
It's interesting that you, uh… you know that.
translation.fr: C'est intéressant que vous sachiez cela.

translation.en: I'm sorry, do I know you?
Just auditing the class.
Any other questions?
All right, the, uh, reading's on my website, and I'll see you Tuesday.
translation.fr: Vous retrouverez le cours sur mon site. À mardi prochain.

translation.en: Adam?
Dad.
Dad.
Adam?
Is… is this time travel?
translation.fr: Vous avez voyagé dans le temps ?

translation.en: - He came from 2050 and got you? - Yes.
translation.fr: Il est venu de 2050 et t'a pris avec lui ? Oui.

translation.en: - How old are you now? - Twelve.
- Why did you need your 12- year- old self? - I didn't.
translation.fr: - Tu avais besoin de toi ado ? - Non.

translation.en: - You needed me to fly the jet. - Jet? There… there's a jet?
translation.fr: - Si, pour conduire la navette. - Il y a une navette ?

translation.en: - My jet. - Oh. What I meant was I didn't need you originally.
translation.fr: Oui. Je n'avais pas besoin de toi au départ.

translation.en: - 2022 was a mistake. - Wh--
And you flew this jet?
- Yes. - Did you, though?
- Is that my jacket? Looks tight on you. - That's what I said.
translation.fr: - Ma veste te boudine. - J'ai dit pareil.

translation.en: - It's fine. - Like a condom with buttons. - This is fun. I'm having fun, are you? - Condom!
translation.fr: - On dirait une capote boutonnée. - Merci, très amusant !

translation.en: And why was 2022 a mistake?
- I wasn't supposed to be there. - You're not supposed to be here.
translation.fr: - J'étais pas censé être là. - Ici non plus.

translation.en: - You don't say. - They shot him when he stole the jet.
translation.fr: Sans blague ! - Il a volé la navette. - Volé ?

translation.en: - Please don't tell him that. - You stole a jet?
translation.fr: - Il a volé la navette. - Volé ?

translation.en: - Why would he need to know that? - Okay, stop. Both of you stop talking now.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu lui dis ça ? - Ça suffit. Taisez-vous tous les deux.

translation.en: Do you realize how absolutely wrong this is?
translation.fr: Tu te rends compte de la situation ?

translation.en: You can't be here. You can't be anywhere but your own timeline.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas être dans une autre ligne temporelle.

translation.en: What do you think we're doin' here? Think we're short of hugs in the future?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu crois qu'on est là ? On manque de câlins ?

translation.en: - There's a reason I need to talk to you. - I don't-- I don't care.
translation.fr: - Je dois te parler. - Je m'en fiche.

translation.en: - He doesn't care. - Don't get me wrong.
I'm very happy to see you, and I mean this in the best possible way,
translation.fr: Je suis content de vous voir et ne le prenez pas mal,

translation.en: but you need to piss off to where you came from.
translation.fr: mais vous devez retourner d'où vous venez.

translation.en: Anything you say or do could cause a divergence.
translation.fr: Tout ce que vous dites ou faites peut créer une divergence.

translation.en: Can you please shut up for a second?
- I'm not gonna listen-- - For a second and listen.
translation.fr: - Je ne vais pas écouter… - Juste un instant.

translation.en: - Shut the physics fountain in your face. - What you are doing is reckless.
translation.fr: Ferme ton moulin à physique. Papa !

translation.en: You okay?
- God damn it! -
- In fairness, I-- - It's okay. I asked him nicely to shut up and listen.
translation.fr: À ma décharge, je lui ai demandé gentiment de se taire et d'écouter.

translation.en: - He did no such thing, so… - It's okay. It's fine. I'm fine.
translation.fr: Ce qu'il a ignoré. Je vais bien.

translation.en: That's what you get. We don't hit people in this family.
translation.fr: C'est mérité. On n'est pas des brutes.

translation.en: What was that?
- That's what you get. - God!
How did you turn out to be an asshole? I thought you loved me.
translation.fr: Comment es-tu devenu si con ? - Tu ne m'aimes pas ? - Si !

translation.en: - I do! - None of it matters anymore.
translation.fr: - Tu ne m'aimes pas ? - Si ! - Ça n'a plus d'importance. - Bien sûr que si.

translation.en: - Are you kidding me? Of course it matters. - Dad.
translation.fr: - Ça n'a plus d'importance. - Bien sûr que si. - Papa. - C'est grave.

translation.en: They don't have safeguards where you come from? - Dad. - Protocols?
- Maya and I agreed. - Dad. - There'd be an ethics panel-- - Dad!
translation.fr: Maya et moi avions convenu d'un comité d'éthique

translation.en: With real oversight.
None of it matters anymore.
Wait. It already happened? Somebody already altered time?
translation.fr: Ça a déjà eu lieu ? Quelqu'un a déjà modifié le temps ?

translation.en: - Who? - Sorian.
- Maya? - Maya.
She'd never do that. She knows the consequences.
- She's been funding my work for years. - The Adam Project.
translation.fr: - Elle me finance depuis des années. - Projet Adam.

translation.en: Yes, I theorized that with a powerful enough pulse,
translation.fr: Oui, j'ai émis l'hypothèse qu'une impulsion assez puissante pourrait créer

translation.en: we could generate utilitarian wormholes in space.
translation.fr: qu'une impulsion assez puissante pourrait créer des trous de ver.

translation.en: And we did it four weeks ago.
But I was… I was just playing with the theory that you can use wormholes for time travel.
translation.fr: Mais je jouais juste avec la théorie du trou de ver pour le voyage temporel.

translation.en: That part's theoretical. - Right. - Still theoretical.
This theory needs to take a leak. So let's go.
translation.fr: Cette théorie doit finir aux chiottes.

translation.en: Holy shit! I'm the godfather of time travel?
translation.fr: Merde alors ! Je suis le parrain du voyage dans le temps ?

translation.en: Nice hit, Dad.
I think I broke my hand.
translation.fr: Je me suis fracassé la main.

translation.en: I'm… I'm sorry. This is my fault.
My… my ego. My hubris.
My need to be best, to be first, to be the smartest guy in the room. And here we are.
translation.fr: Mon besoin d'être le meilleur, le premier, le plus intelligent.

translation.en: - A disgusting character flaw. - He didn't know.
translation.fr: - Un vilain défaut. - Tu savais pas.

translation.en: - But I should have. - Yeah.
Mankind has no business tampering with the mechanics of the universe.
translation.fr: L'humanité ne doit pas toucher à la mécanique de l'univers.

translation.en: There are forces greater than science.
translation.fr: Il y a des forces plus grandes.

translation.en: Right. That's why we're gonna put the genie back in the bottle.
translation.fr: Exact. Remettons le génie dans sa lampe.

translation.en: Destroy time travel before it's even invented.
translation.fr: On va tuer le voyage temporel dans l'œuf.

translation.en: What's done, no matter how terrible,
should not and cannot be undone under any circumstance.
translation.fr: ne peuvent être effacés en aucune circonstance.

translation.en: Even us being here, talking like this, we're perverting fate and time.
translation.fr: Le fait même d'en parler déforme le destin et le temps.

translation.en: I told you Sorian already did that. She's had the world by the balls since.
translation.fr: Sorian l'a déjà fait et tient le monde par les couilles.

translation.en: And you know that for a fact?
Do you have scientific proof that she changed things?
translation.fr: Tu as une preuve de son interférence ?

translation.en: No, you don't because you can't know. But I will tell you this.
translation.fr: Non, car tu ne peux pas savoir. Mais sache ceci.

translation.en: You being here opens up the potential for catastrophic reconfiguration.
translation.fr: Ta présence ici ouvre la porte à une reconfiguration catastrophique.

translation.en: - And that is quantifiable, that-- - Stop. Stop.
translation.fr: Et ça, c'est quantifiable. - Arrête ! - Arrête quoi ?

translation.en: - Stop. - Stop what?
- Stop being a scientist. - But I am a scient--
Be a father.
You were always more interested in the universe than your son.
translation.fr: Tu t'intéresses plus à l'univers qu'à ton fils.

translation.en: - That's not true. - That is true.
And when you're older, you'll realize that. It--
translation.fr: Tu t'en rendras compte plus tard.

translation.en: You know what? It's…
That ship has sailed. It's too late for me. So, you know, whatever. I'm fine.
translation.fr: C'est trop tard pour moi. Je m'en fiche. Je vais bien.

translation.en: But he needs you.
And you? What do you need?
I need to go for a walk.
I can't be here, Adam. I… I have to go.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas être là, je dois y aller.

translation.en: - Please don't go. - I have to.
translation.fr: - Ne pars pas. - Il le faut.

translation.en: - Please. - This is… this is bigger than any of us.
It's too dangerous what he's asking me to do. I can't.
translation.fr: Ce qu'il attend de moi est trop dangereux.

translation.en: All right. We'll see each other again.
Wait.
- I need to tell you something. - No, you can't say anything else to me.
translation.fr: - Je dois te dire… - Non. Tu ne peux rien me dire d'autre.

translation.en: I can't know the future.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas savoir l'avenir.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I have to go home. Your mom and you are waiting.
translation.fr: Je dois rentrer. Ta mère et toi m'attendez.

translation.en: Yes, Senator.
Except the stability of these wormholes is no longer a hypothetical,
translation.fr: Mais la stabilité de ces trous de ver n'est plus une hypothèse

translation.en: and the work we are doing here is simply ahead of the current statutes.
translation.fr: et nos travaux ont une longueur d'avance.

translation.en: So you can either support my program and be a part of the future,
translation.fr: Soit vous soutenez mon programme et faites partie du futur,

translation.en: or you can get left behind in the past.
translation.fr: soit vous restez dans le passé.

translation.en: Hang up the phone.
What are you doing here? You said I wouldn't be seeing you again.
translation.fr: Que fais-tu ici ? Tu as dit que je ne te reverrais plus.

translation.en: Did I? Hmm.
When was that? Remind me.
The last time you just showed up, two months ago.
translation.fr: La dernière fois, il y a deux mois.

translation.en: Oh, well, for me, it was 32 years ago.
translation.fr: Ah oui… Il y a 32 ans pour moi.

translation.en: So sorry if I'm a little fuzzy on the details.
translation.fr: Désolée si mes souvenirs sont confus.

translation.en: Anyway, times have changed.
You can't be here.
You know the potential for catastrophic changes to the time stream.
translation.fr: Tu connais le risque de changements dans la ligne temporelle.

translation.en: - It's incalculable. - God, I was such a nerd. Will you please just stop talking?
translation.fr: J'étais vraiment rasoir. Tu peux te taire ?

translation.en: Everything you asked me to do.
translation.fr: Tous ces achats d'actions, ces comptes à l'étranger.

translation.en: The stock buys, the offshore accounts, all of it. It's unethical.
translation.fr: Tous ces achats d'actions, ces comptes à l'étranger. Tout ça, c'est malhonnête.

translation.en: - And illegal. - This isn't a joke. It's dangerous.
translation.fr: Et illégal. Ce n'est pas drôle. C'est dangereux !

translation.en: The environmental impact alone from the companies you had me pick
translation.fr: Rien que l'impact sur l'environnement des entreprises que tu as choisies

translation.en: could be devastating.
In fairness to us, the environment was pretty much toast before we came along.
translation.fr: À notre décharge, l'environnement était déjà en sale état.

translation.en: And by the way, Maya, you did it, all of it,
translation.fr: Et par ailleurs, tu m'as obéi à la lettre,

translation.en: because somewhere inside that cheap suit and ridiculous ponytail is me.
translation.fr: car quelque part derrière ton costume bon marché et ta queue-de-rat, il y a moi.

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Where you going?
You seeing someone?
No, you're not. You're too busy.
Thing is, you always will be.
This company is all you will ever have.
translation.fr: Cette entreprise sera tout pour toi.

translation.en: - - It is your personal life.
It's your family.
But this is our legacy.
And if we had let the government take it from us,
translation.fr: Et si on avait laissé le gouvernement nous l'enlever,

translation.en: then everything we sacrificed,
all that loneliness,
all that loneliness,
would've been for nothing.
And I did it.
I fixed that future where we had been forgotten.
translation.fr: J'ai réparé cet avenir où on avait été oubliées.

translation.en: Then why are you back here now?
I'm back
because we can't control time travel if it never existed.
translation.fr: car pour contrôler le voyage temporel, il doit exister.

translation.en: And your buddy Adam Reed is about to betray you.
translation.fr: Et ton pote Adam Reed va te trahir.

translation.en: Adam? He's just a little kid.
Yeah, well, that little kid…
…he grows up to be a very big pain in our ass.
Trust me. You're gonna want this.
What?
I know you think you know more than me because you're older.
translation.fr: Tu crois tout mieux savoir car tu es plus âgé.

translation.en: Go away, Adam.
And I know why you hate him so much.
translation.fr: Je sais pourquoi tu le détestes.

translation.en: Really?
Well, do tell. I'm on the edge of my seat here.
translation.fr: Dis-moi. Je suis pendu à tes lèvres.

translation.en: Holy shit. I wonder what it i-- Was it because he's narcissistic,
translation.fr: Je me demande si c'est son narcissisme,

He'd see me throwin' in the yard, and no matter how tired he was,
